English.Text: The onslaught of words seem to rile him up,"Get away devil interlopers!" he dances to a keen-tipped spear, and jabs it at any who draw near. "We don't believe you! My Lord does not believe you! You had better leave before he gets angry!" The crew feel so claustrophobic, with this man, and the fly-coated pig's head that they run back to the ship. The voyage resumes without the extra supplies that all had hoped for.
